description: Classic play on words with 'ajar' sounding like 'a jar'.
title: Door Dilemma
n_1: Tom struggles to close the door.
c2_2: Hmm, it seems fine to me.
n_3: Tom points out the issue more clearly.
c1_3: It’s like it’s not even a door.
n_4: Tom delivers the punchline with a grin.
c2_4: Oh, right, it’s ajar. Nice one!
